title: Horizon Zero Dawn Hits 20 Million! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.11.22
description:
Blessing and special guest Erin A Simon tackle a BIG numbers day. Let's talk about Horizon Sales, Pokemon Sales, and NPDs most interesting numbers!

Follow Erin: https://twitter.com/erinasimon

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:10:10 - Housekeeping
Andy's youtube short about his Elden Ring preview is up right now on youtube.com/kindafunnygames. An extended version will be on our Twitter later today. That's @KindaFunnyvids on Twitter.
Remember: It’s review season. Your next episode of the Kinda Funny Gamescast will be our Horizon Forbidden West review. That’ll be up Monday, Valentine’s day on Youtube.com/kindafunnygames and podcast services around the globe.
SPEAKING OF REVIEW SEASON: Kinda Funny has a new review scale! Kev bring up the video
After that, write into PS I Love You XOXO with all of your Horizon Forbidden West questions so we can tackle them on that show.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Gordon McGuire, James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes), Pranksy, Manny The Bagel boy Sanchez, & Black Jack
The Roper Report  -
00:13:22 - Pokémon topped US game sales in January - Tom Ivan @ VGC
00:23:40 - Horizon Zero Dawn has sold 20 million copies - Tom Ivan @ VGC
00:33:48 - SIFU has sold half a million
00:36:15 - Ad
00:38:20 - King of Fighters XV Review Round Up
00:48:00 - Elden Ring Producer Promises Difficult Optional Bosses Hidden Through Its World - Ryan Dinsdale @ IGN
00:54:00 - Nintendo hacker Gary Bowser sentenced to 3 years in jail - Jordan Middler @ VGC
00:4: - Microsoft Promises To Put the ‘Right People in the Right Position’ To Improve Activision Blizzard Culture - Ryan Dinsdale @ IGN
01:02:45 - Out today
Required Reading: Inside Team17, following the Worms NFT firestorm - Tom Phillips @ Eurogamer
https://www.eurogamer.net/articles/2022-02-10-inside-team17-following-the-worms-nft-firestorm
01:04:40 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:
MON: Blessing and Tim
TUES: Greg and Gary Whitta
WED: Blessing and Andy
THURS: Greg and Tim
FRI: Blessing and Jordan Ramee
